message: I say we start working on an open source alternative
Will it suddenly cost monies when we're eventually addicted?
“For now we're focused on building a great product and fostering a thriving community.”
Are there any plans to open source Convore?
no i think we should pay for it like $20 a month
I wouldn't worry, their plan is prolly to build up a userbase for the next year or two, and then get gobbled up by a google or aol
Sorry I can't give a better answer, but I did my best on Quora: http://www.quora.com/How-will-Convore-make-money
It's pretty awesome, If they start charging money like hipchat did, it wont be great, but i actually might pay haha. (but the majority of people on convore would leave so i might be alone xD)
And yes, it would be less crowded if not at least basic usage was free, which would kill much of the fun here.
I'm not unwilling to pay for a good service, rather, at the moment, I'm unable. Some uses would also not make sense if it's not at least free to use a group (say, using convore as a support forum).
@dag on a side note, i'm from StartupLi.st, were looking for a dev if you're interested. :-) shoot me an email at jeff (at) startupli.st
